mapper.select: select sdp.*,concat_ws('-',cb.no,cbu.no,cbue.room_number) as room_name,ur.name as customer_name,sctd.name as charges_template_detail_name from sys_daily_payment as sdp,cpm_building_unit_estate as cbue,cpm_building_unit as cbu,cpm_building as cb,cpm_resident_estate as cre,user_resident as ur,sys_charges_template_detail as sctd where sdp.building_unit_estate_id = cbue.id and cbue.building_unit_id = cbu.id and cbu.building_id = cb.id and cre.building_unit_estate_id = sdp.building_unit_estate_id and cre.resident_id = ur.id and sctd.id = sdp.charges_template_detail_id and sdp.id = #{id} limit 1
mapper.insert:
insert into sys_daily_payment_order( daily_payment_id, code, name, tel, pay_type, pay_price, create_id, create_date, remake ) values ( #{dailyPaymentId}, #{code}, #{name}, #{tel}, #{payType}, #{payPrice}, #{createId}, #{createDate}, #{remake} )
select LAST_INSERT_ID() AS id
